alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 5:48AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Faulkner, central Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 615 AM CST... At 548 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem in Saline County, or 7 miles northwest of Bryant, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Argenta... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Gravel Ridge... Morgan... Marche... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CST for central Arkansas.
